page.title: 06A day at Shuckers Farm
page.content: Every morning my dad gets up at six thirty.He then goes outside to feed the{cows}and the{sheep.}Then it is time for him to go to work, so he has his breakfast then goes.Then my mum comes out and feeds the{goats}and the {chickens}and our{donkey.}It is then time for us to have our breakfast. After breakfast my mum picks the {vegetables}or tidies the house.When my dad gets back from work he sometimes puts fetilizer on the field. After that it is time to feed the animals again.After that my dad sometimes makes hay in the summer.We have got hundred acres of land which is grass land.In the morning my dad takes some cattle which go to {Guildford.}In the spring it is our busiest time because we have lambing. When the lambs are bigger we sell them.
